item.title: 中美债券收益率走向相反方向
item.description: 世界上最大的两个经济体的债券市场发出的信号对比再明显不过了。【原文：The contrast in signals from the bond markets of the world’s two largest economies couldn’t be clearer.】

item.title: 美国政府正在研究解决住房危机的可能方案
item.description:
开放公共土地供开发的想法得到了两党的支持，并减少了繁文缛节。【原文：

The idea of opening up public lands to development enjoys bipartisan support and cuts through red tape.

】

item.title: 特朗普抨击风车后引发风电股暴跌
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他的目标是在上任后不再在美国新建风力发电厂，在此之后，一些欧洲最大的风力发电公司的股票周三下跌。【原文：Shares in some of Europe’s biggest wind power companies fell Wednesday after President-elect Donald Trump said he aimed to have no new windmills in the US after taking office.】

item.title: 食品成本导致加纳通胀率创八个月新高
item.description: 12 月份，加纳的年通货膨胀率攀升至八个月来的最高水平，降低了本月晚些时候降息的可能性。【原文：Ghana’s annual inflation rate climbed to its highest level in eight months in December, reducing the prospects of an interest-rate cut later this month.】

item.title: 普京蓬勃发展的战争经济有望平稳着陆
item.description: 弗拉基米尔-普京总统入侵乌克兰引发了俄罗斯在政府刺激政策支持下的经济繁荣。近三年来，种种迹象表明，这笔账单即将到期。【原文：President Vladimir Putin’s invasion of Ukraine triggered an economic boom in Russia built on the back of government stimulus. Almost three years on, there are gathering signs the bill is about to come due.】

item.title: 爱尔兰危机时期的不良银行制定了 2025 年清盘计划
item.description: 爱尔兰国家资产管理局周四制定了一项计划，将在 2025 年底前完成清盘工作。【原文：Ireland’s National Asset Management Agency set out a plan to complete its wind down by the end of 2025 on Thursday.】

item.title: 据当地媒体报道，印尼将把出口收入留在国内一年
item.description: 印尼当地新闻媒体 Kontan 援引一位高级部长的话报道称，印尼将要求自然资源出口商将部分外汇收入留在岸上至少一年，以增加外汇储备。【原文：Indonesia will require exporters of natural resources to keep part of their foreign currency earnings onshore for at least one year in a bid to boost foreign reserves, local news outlet Kontan reported, citing a senior minister.】

item.title: 欧盟誓言 "积极 "调查《数字规则手册》下的 X 问题
item.description: 欧盟高级数字官员承诺将 "积极 "推进对埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 社交网络是否违反欧盟内容审核法的调查。【原文：The European Union’s top digital officials have committed to “energetically” push forward an investigation into whether Elon Musk’s X social network breached the bloc’s content moderation law.】

item.title: 喜力印度分公司停止向重要邦销售啤酒，股价下跌
item.description: 喜力公司（Heineken NV）的印度分公司以无利可图的价格和拖欠货款为由，暂停向印度南部的特兰加纳邦供应啤酒。【原文：Heineken NV’s Indian unit suspended supply of beer to the southern Indian state of Telangana, citing unprofitable prices and missed payments.】

item.title: 从国防到可再生能源，特朗普言论引发股市大波动
item.description: 就职典礼前几天，唐纳德-特朗普发表了从国防到可再生能源，甚至格陵兰岛的各种言论，令股市为之振奋。【原文：Days before his inauguration, Donald Trump is moving stock markets with comments on everything from defense to renewable energy, and even Greenland.】

item.title: 美光斥资 70 亿美元建设新加坡存储芯片工厂
item.description: 随着人工智能对先进存储芯片需求的增长，美光科技公司（Micron Technology Inc.【原文：Micron Technology Inc. is investing $7 billion over the next several years to expand its manufacturing footprint in Singapore, as artificial intelligence boosts demand for advanced memory chips.】

item.title: 芬兰称被扣押的影子舰队油轮不适航
item.description: 芬兰当局在对这艘被扣押的油轮进行检查后，认为其不适航，而这艘油轮是俄罗斯石油运输船队的一部分。【原文：Finnish authorities deemed the detained tanker that’s part of the fleet carrying Russian oil as not seaworthy after inspections onboard.】

item.title: 英国陷入困境的股票基金第九年遭遇资金外流
item.description: 投资者连续第九年将资金撤出英国股票基金，因为他们继续放弃表现不佳的市场，转而在美国科技股中寻找更好的回报。【原文：Investors moved money out of UK-focused equity funds for a ninth straight year as they continue to bail on an underperforming market and find better returns in US tech stocks.】

item.title: 银行业反弹，新加坡股票基准创历史新高
item.description: 受银行股持续反弹的提振，新加坡股票基准周三收盘创下历史新高。【原文：Singapore’s stock benchmark closed at an all-time high on Wednesday, boosted by the ongoing rally in bank shares.】

item.title: 克莱奥斯提出贷款交易，帮助筹集 45 亿美元股息资金
item.description: 汽车电池制造商克莱瑞斯国际公司（Clarios International Inc.【原文：Car battery maker Clarios International Inc. launched a loan deal on Wednesday that will go toward paying a $4.5 billion dividend to its private equity owners — one of the largest such payouts on record.】

item.title: 借贷成本飙升，英国准备出售新的五年期债券
item.description: 英国正努力在十多年来最大规模的五年期债券销售与借贷成本飙升之间寻求平衡。【原文：The UK is seeking to juggle the biggest sale of five-year bonds in more than a decade against a surge in borrowing costs.】

item.title: 马来西亚评估 LinkedIn 的社交媒体许可需求
item.description: 随着马来西亚政府寻求扩大对互联网的控制，马来西亚正在研究 LinkedIn 公司是否需要获得社交媒体许可证才能继续在马来西亚运营。【原文：Malaysia is studying whether LinkedIn Corp. will require a social media license to continue operating in Malaysia as the government seeks to broaden internet controls.】

item.title: 富士康、迪克森敦促印度支付尚未支付的生产补贴
item.description: 苹果公司供应商富士康科技集团（Foxconn Technology Group）和迪克森科技印度有限公司（Dixon Technologies India Ltd.）要求印度向它们支付数十亿卢比的补贴，它们认为根据政府的生产激励计划，它们有权获得这些补贴。【原文：Apple Inc. supplier Foxconn Technology Group and Dixon Technologies India Ltd. are asking India to pay them billions of rupees in subsidies they think they are entitled to under the government’s production incentives program.】

item.title: Amundi 债券主管称美国 10 年期债券收益率可能再次超过 5
item.description: 欧洲最大的资产管理公司 Amundi SA 固定收益部门主管 Amaury D'Orsay 说，10 年期美国国债收益率有 "合理 "的可能再次测试 5%的关键水平。【原文：There’s a “reasonable” chance that the yield on 10-year US Treasuries will again test the key level of 5%, said Amaury D’Orsay, head of fixed income at Amundi SA, Europe’s largest asset manager.】

item.title: 上一次债券收益率如此飙升，股市却一蹶不振
item.description: 随着债券收益率逼近近年来令股市痛苦的水平，股市还有进一步下跌的空间。【原文：There’s room for stock markets to fall further as bond yields approach levels that have been painful for equities in recent years.】

item.title: 欠款飙升，高风险的英国抵押贷款债券面临现金流压力
item.description: 惠誉评级公司（Fitch Ratings）认为，债务被捆绑成住宅抵押贷款支持证券的英国弱势业主在贷款到期时偿还本金的能力存在 "重大不确定性"。【原文：There is “significant uncertainty” about the ability of weaker UK home owners whose debt was bundled into residential mortgage-backed securities to repay the principle when the loans mature, according to Fitch Ratings.】

item.title: 南非工厂因需求疲软、物流受阻而情绪低落
item.description: 由于国内需求疲软、出口销售下降和物流中断对各行业造成影响，南非制造商的情绪在 12 月份连续第二个月低迷。【原文：Sentiment among South African manufacturers soured for a second month in December as weak domestic demand, declining export sales and logistical disruptions weighed on industries.】

item.title: 德意志银行向阿布扎比第一银行购买不良贷款组合
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）将从阿拉伯联合酋长国最大的贷款机构收购价值约 8 亿美元的不良贷款组合，这是海湾地区罕见的大型不良债务交易。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG is set to acquire a portfolio of soured loans worth around $800 million from the United Arab Emirates’s largest lender in a rare large deal in the Gulf for distressed debt, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 长短期利率为何脱节
item.description: 自 9 月中旬以来，美国联邦储备委员会已将基准利率下调了 100 个基点。然而，30 年期国债收益率却上升了大约同样的幅度。英国 30 年期国债收益率创下 1998 年以来的新高，而英国央行也在放宽货币政策。【原文：Since mid-September, the US Federal Reserve has cut benchmark interest rates by 100 basis points. Yet the yield on 30-year Treasury bonds has risen by around the same amount. This divergence between short- and long-term rates is counterintuitive and far from isolated, with UK 30-year yields hitting the highest since 1998 even as the Bank of England eases monetary policy.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡总督表示，通货紧缩将为斯里兰卡人提供 "喘息 "机会
item.description: 斯里兰卡中央银行行长表示，斯里兰卡的通货紧缩环境预计将在 2025 年初持续下去，这突显了这个在前所未有的经济危机期间一直与高物价作斗争的南亚国家的情况发生了变化。【原文：A deflationary environment in Sri Lanka is expected to continue in early 2025, according to the central bank governor, highlighting a change in scenario for the South Asian nation that had struggled with high prices during an unprecedented economic crisis.】

item.title: Mutares 控股的瑞典建筑公司申请破产
item.description: 德国投资集团 Mutares SE & Co.称，其投资的 Serneke Sverige AB 公司已在瑞典申请破产，这是北欧最大国家中建筑商倒闭的最新案例。【原文：German investment group Mutares SE & Co. said that its portfolio company Serneke Sverige AB has filed for bankruptcy in Sweden in the latest collapse of a builder in the biggest Nordic country.】

item.title: 拥有 10 家股票的卢旺达交易所希望将上市量提高 20
item.description: 卢旺达证券交易所今年的目标是吸引两家公司进行首次公开募股，并打赌过去十年平均超过 6.6% 的经济增长将刺激公司扩张。【原文：The Rwanda Stock Exchange is targeting to lure two initial public offerings this year, betting economic growth that’s averaged more than 6.6% in the past decade will spur companies to expand.】

item.title: 杉树在法律诉讼前削减 SBB 债券持有量
item.description: 在 Fir Tree Partners 大幅缩减其在该案中的债券持有量并退出旗下三只基金中的两只之后，针对瑞典房东 SBB 提起的诉讼的潜在影响有所减弱。【原文：The potential fallout from a lawsuit brought against Swedish landlord SBB lessened after Fir Tree Partners dramatically scaled back its holdings of bonds at the center of the case and two of its three funds dropped out.】

item.title: 法国消费者信心在政治阴霾中意外下滑
item.description: 法国消费者信心指数在 12 月份意外降至一年来的最低水平，这进一步表明该国长期的政治和预算危机正在拖累经济前景。【原文：French consumer confidence unexpectedly fell in December to the lowest level in a year, adding to signals the country’s prolonged political and budget crisis is weighing on the economic outlook.】

item.title: 融创股票和债券下跌，现金利息支付迫在眉睫
item.description: 中国房地产开发商融创中国控股有限公司（Sunac China Holdings Ltd.）的股票和美元票据跌至几个月来的最低水平，原因是在销售低迷的情况下，投资者对即将到来的利息支付感到焦虑。【原文：Chinese property developer Sunac China Holdings Ltd.’s shares and dollar notes fell to their lowest levels in months, as investors grow anxious about upcoming interest payments amid sluggish sales.】
